  /** * Get the points of any regular polygon based on * the number of sides and radius. */ _getRegularPolygonPoints() { let points = []; let i = 0; while (i < this._sides) { // Note that sin and cos are inverted in order to draw // polygon pointing down. let x = -this._radius * Math.sin(i * 2 * Math.PI / this._sides); let y = this._radius * Math.cos(i * 2 * Math.PI / this._sides); points.push({x, y}); i++; } return points; }
